main_definition: Refers to something becoming greater in amount, size, or degree.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To become larger in quantity or number
meanings_and_examples.example: The company reported increased profits this quarter.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To grow more than before in amount, size, or intensity
meanings_and_examples.example: After a warm day, the temperature had increased to 85 degrees Fahrenheit.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An enhanced level of an attribute, quality, or condition
meanings_and_examples.example: The new software version has increased security features compared to its predecessor.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To raise the rate or pace at which something happens or is done
meanings_and_examples.example: Due to a surge in demand, production was increased to meet customer needs.
